info.description: API to manage Account related services, for retrieving Balances, Transaction details, Card details, Emergency Blocks, Funds Diversion & Account Closures
info.title: Account management

get.description: Retrieves the Account Closure Information of the Account such as Closure Date and Reason, Mode of Closure, Balances on the date of Closing and Pending Charges

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

put.description: Updates Account Closure Information for the specific Account such as Closure Date and Reason, Mode of Closure & Closing Charges

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

get.description: Retrieves the Currency, Balances, Limit details and Arrangement details of an account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

parameters.name: limitReference
parameters.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

get.description: Retrieves the Transaction details of the Account such as Transaction references, Opening & Closing Balances, date of Transaction and Amount based on the range of date of specified

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: bookingDate
parameters.description: Business date on which the accounting entry was generated.

parameters.name: processingDate
parameters.description: The date when payment instruction is processed in system.

parameters.name: valueDate
parameters.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

parameters.name: reversalMarker
parameters.description: Denotes the flag which is set whenever any credit or reversal debit entries with future exposure dates are processed

parameters.name: includeSubAcct
parameters.description: Denotes the flag which needs to be set in order to allow the automatic creation of sub-accounts and the automatic distribution of transactions over sub-accounts

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

get.description: Retrieves the Card details of the Account such as Card Number, Card Type & Status of the Card

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: cardIssueId
parameters.description: The identifier of the issued card formatted as cardType '.' cardNumber. E.g. VISA.1234567887654321 GC.1111222233334444 AB21.1111111122222222

parameters.name: issueDate
parameters.description: The date the item was issued.

parameters.name: expiryDate
parameters.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

parameters.name: cardStatus
parameters.description: Current status of the Card and following are the possible statuses are  - CARD.ISSUED - CARD.RETURNED - CARD.SCRAP - CARD.CANCEL - NOT.ACTIVATED - NOT.RECEIVED - ACTIVE - BLOCKED - EXPIRED

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

closureDate.description: The date when the Security Account is to be closed

capitaliseInterest.description: Indicate how a closed account must capitalize interest

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

closeMode.description: Mode of the account closure needs to be specified

closureReason.description: This field contains the reason for closing the account

closureNotes.description: This field is used to hold the notes for the reason of account closure

onlineLedgerBalance.description: Contains the current Online Actual Balance on the ACCOUNT at the time the Posting Restriction to flag it for closure was entered

onlineClearedBalance.description: Indicates the available balance allowed to use

balancePayable.description: Defines the total balance amount to the account inclusive of all charges and interest applicable at present

totalCreditInterest.description: The total amount of outstanding credit and credit 2 interest calculated up to the specified Capitalisation Date

totalDebitInterest.description: The total amount of outstanding debit and debit 2 interest calculated up to the specified Capitalisation Date

totalDrInterestPending.description: The total amount of outstanding debit and debit 2 interest calculated up to the specified Capitalisation Date.

totalCharges.description: The total amount of outstanding account 'ledger' charges and interest related charges calculated up to the specified Capitalisation Date

totalChargesPending.description: This field reflects the total charges pending on the account.

totalTax.description: The total amount of Tax on outstanding interest and charges calculated up to the specified Capitalisation Date

totalTaxPending.description: This field reflects the total tax pending on the account

postingRestriction.description: Identifies any restrictions for posting entries that are to be imposed on the Account

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The code related to override message.

options.description: The usable options for the override.

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

relationCode.description: Identifies the inter-relationship between Customer records and enables a link to be formed for the purpose of evaluating the overall Customer position

customerRole.description: Indicates role of a customer for an arrangement.

customerType.description: Illustrates the capacity in which a client is acting.Possible Values : Customer, Broker, Depository, Client, Counterparty, External Account Manager, Active, Prospect, NULL

roleDisplayName.description: Indicates the type of role of a customer

lastName.description: The last name of an individual customer

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect

postCode.description: Identifies the address postal code for the customer.

street.description: Contains the first line of customer's base address, example building number, street number etc.

townCountry.description: The town and country associated with the address

salutation.description: Identifies the greeting used for communication by the customer

employmentStatus.description: Identifies the employment status of the customer

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

lockedAmount.description: Shows reserved amount for the underlying account for a given balance reservation event.

workingBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account and, unless it is a nostro or internal account, unauthorised debit entries.

onlineActualBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account, excluding any entries with a future processing date.

availableBalance.description: Available balance of the account which is the projected balance which includes the net movements of both debits and credits against the account.

sortCode.description: Contains bank sort code or iban branch identifier for the account

availableLimit.description: The portion of an allocated credit limit that is available for the nominated customer

IBAN.description: International Bank Account number, an identifier of the account. E.g. GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

openingDate.description: The date the account is opened.

limitReference.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

clearedBalance.description: Balance taking into consideration all cleared funds booked against the account, including credit and reversed debit entries with a future exposure date.

availableFunds.description: Total funds available in the account after all the ongoing transactions have been completed

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

categoryName.description: Name that is displayed for the product category

categoryId.description: Unique identifier associated with the product name of the account or contract. For example: For customer/counterparty accounts, the identifier would be in the range 1000 to 9999. For ledger accounts, in the range 10000 to 19999.

The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

openingBalance.description: Balance brought forward from the previous date/period.

bookingDate.description: Business date on which the accounting entry was generated.

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

debitCreditIndicator.description: Indicator flag which is set whenever a debit or a credit transaction happens in the account

transactionTotal.description: The total amount of the transaction

accountIds.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

cardIssueId.description: The identifier of the issued card formatted as cardType '.' cardNumber. E.g. VISA.1234567887654321 GC.1111222233334444 AB21.1111111122222222

cardDisplayNumber.description: The number which is up for display on the credit or debit card.

cardType.description: The type of the card, e.g. Visa, Mastercard, etc.

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

issueDate.description: The date the item was issued.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

cardStatus.description: Current status of the Card and following are the possible statuses are  - CARD.ISSUED - CARD.RETURNED - CARD.SCRAP - CARD.CANCEL - NOT.ACTIVATED - NOT.RECEIVED - ACTIVE - BLOCKED - EXPIRED

fullCardNumber.description: The complete card number including the combination of bank codes, account number and other card convention

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified.

limitReferenceId.description: Limit reference identifier for the limit order.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

workingBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account and, unless it is a nostro or internal account, unauthorised debit entries.

ledgerBalance.description: Contains the ledger balance of the account which is the total of all entries posted against the account excluding any entries with the processing date in the future.

clearedBalance.description: Balance taking into consideration all cleared funds booked against the account, including credit and reversed debit entries with a future exposure date.

lockedAmount.description: Shows reserved amount for the underlying account for a given balance reservation event.

useableBalance.description: Refers the usable amount in the balance

bookingDate.description: Business date on which the accounting entry was generated.

creditMovement.description: Indicates an account's credit movement's for a specific booking date which will not include any of the credit movements that are masked

debitMovement.description: Indicates an account's debit movement's for a specific booking date which will not include any of the debit movements that are masked.

grossCreditMovement.description: Indicates an account's credit movement's for a specific booking date which includes credit movements that are masked

grossDebitMovement.description: Indicates an account's debit movement's for a specific booking date which includes credit movements that are masked

emergencyBlock.description: Indicates if there is an emergency block in an account.

emergencyReason.description: Indicates the reason for emergency block in an account.

emergencyBlock.description: Indicates if there is an emergency block in an account.

emergencyReason.description: Indicates the reason for emergency block in an account.

faStatus.description: Funds authorisation status of the system.
Funds authorisation status of the system.

transactionCodes.description: Identifies the system internal transaction code applicable to the transaction

transactionCode.description: Identifies the system internal transaction code applicable to the transaction

defaultFundsDiversion.description: Specifies the behaviour of diversion of funds to be followed by the Accounting System. Allowed values are YES - to divert the funds to  the diversion account of the original account , NO - diversion of funds do not take place.

transactionCodes.description: Identifies the system internal transaction code applicable to the transaction

transactionCode.description: Identifies the system internal transaction code applicable to the transaction

defaultFundsDiversion.description: Specifies the behaviour of diversion of funds to be followed by the Accounting System. Allowed values are YES - to divert the funds to  the diversion account of the original account , NO - diversion of funds do not take place.

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

openingBalance.description: Balance brought forward from the previous date/period.

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

bookingDate.description: Business date on which the accounting entry was generated.

balance.description: The monetary value of each balance type for an account is itemised.

date.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

balance.description: The monetary value of each balance type for an account is itemised.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

bankName.description: The name of the bank being referred to.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN
Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified.

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

onlineActualBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account, excluding any entries with a future processing date.
